SELECT emb_service.type_id ,emb_studio.* ,emb_service_type.name AS tname
FROM emb_service_type RIGHT JOIN emb_service ON emb_service_type.id = emb_service.type_id RIGHT JOIN emb_studio ON emb_studio.id = emb_service.studio_id WHERE 1=1
AND emb_service_type.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tname},'%')
AND emb_studio.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT emb_studio.* FROM emb_studio WHERE 1=1
AND emb_studio.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT DISTINCT emb_studio.city FROM emb_studio WHERE 1=1
SELECT emb_studio.* FROM emb_studio WHERE emb_studio.is_stick = 'RAISE' AND emb_studio.city = #{city}
